welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Harwood Heights, a charming town known for its friendly community and beautiful parks. Get ready to explore and experience all that this wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
